summary:
Smallville is a TV show about Superman's early life. It follows Clark Kent, a teenage boy living in Smallville, Kansas, as he discovers his superpowers and deals with high school dramas. The series focuses on his friendships, especially with Lana Lang and his future enemy, Lex Luthor. As it progresses, Clark grows up and starts his superhero journey.

The show was created by Alfred Gough and Miles Millar, inspired by Batman's origin story. It aired for 10 seasons, becoming the longest-running sci-fi series in North America at the time. Smallville received positive reviews and won many awards.
title: Smallville
